title: Kings Mountain National Military Park: Field Trips
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips                Plan a Field Trip       Whether you plan your own trip entirely or would like to meet up with a ranger, there are a variety of opportunities available to educational groups visiting the park. There is no charge for field trips, but all groups must schedule a field trip in advance. Please use this helpful information sheet and call 864-936-7921 to inquire about availability. A designated eating area is located within the park.
